QAPair.Question: What is (are) Cataracts - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: You are having a procedure to remove a cataract. A cataract occurs when the lens of the eye becomes cloudy and starts to block vision. Removing the cataract can help improve your vision. Below are some questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you take care of your eye after surgery.
